longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months for holders
of British passports endorsed  British Citizen  or  British
National (Overseas)".
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months for holders
of British passports endorsed  British Subject , which also
contain a Certificate of Entitlement to the Right of Abode
issued by the United Kingdom; 
Visa required, except for Children under 17 years of age of
any nationality , if having Moroccan parent(s) and being
registered in parent's passport. 
Minors:
- Minors up to/incl. 16 years old, 
- Minors who are either travelling unaccompanied or are over
  16 years of age must hold their own, separate passport.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.
- Extension of stay possible for holders of normal passports
  with a visa exemption, by changing their status with the
  authorities (DGSN).  
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets  co
  uld be refused entry
